body:
Ok, I've written the following Go program to try and figure out the current implementation situation. Hopefully this is enough data to go on.

https://play.golang.org/p/y1hrcHp2iO

I ran it on a Windows machine (~~with Go 1.6; I'll try installing 1.7beta2 tomorrow and ensure it produces same output~~ with Go 1.7beta2):

```
$ go version
go version go1.7beta2 windows/386

$ go run filepath.go
filepath.Abs("forward/slash/foo/bar") = (string)("c:\\Documents and Settings\\Dmitri\\Desktop\\forward\\slash\\foo\\bar"),
        (interface{})(nil)

filepath.EvalSymlinks("C:/Go/src/path/filepath") = (string)("C:\\Go\\src\\path\\filepath"),
        (interface{})(nil)
filepath.Ext("forward/slash.foo/bar") = (string)("")
filepath.Ext(`forward/slash.foo\bar`) = (string)("")
filepath.Ext("forward/slash.foo_bar") = (string)(".foo_bar")
filepath.FromSlash("forward/slash/foo/bar") = (string)("forward\\slash\\foo\\bar")
filepath.Glob("C:/Go/src/*/template") = ([]string)([]string{
        (string)("C:\\Go\\src\\html\\template"),
        (string)("C:\\Go\\src\\text\\template"),

        (interface{})(nil)

filepath.IsAbs(`/forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (bool)(false)

filepath.IsAbs(`C:/forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (bool)(true)
filepath.IsAbs(`C:\forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (bool)(true)
filepath.Join("forward/slash/foo/bar") = (string)("forward\\slash\\foo\\bar")
filepath.Match("C:/Go/src/*/filepath", `C:/Go/src/path/filepath`) = (bool)(true),
        (interface{})(nil)
filepath.Match(`C:\Go\src\*\filepath`, `C:\Go\src\path\filepath`) = (bool)(true),
        (interface{})(nil)
filepath.Rel("C:/Go/src", "C:/Go/src/path/filepath") = (string)("path\\filepath"),
        (interface{})(nil)
filepath.Rel(`C:\Go\src`, "C:/Go/src/path/filepath") = (string)("path\\filepath"),
        (interface{})(nil)
filepath.Rel("C:/Go/src", `C:\Go\src\path\filepath`) = (string)("path\\filepath"),
        (interface{})(nil)
filepath.Split("forward/slash/foo/bar") = (string)("forward/slash/foo/"),
        (string)("bar")
filepath.SplitList("forward/slash/foo/bar") = ([]string)([]string{
        (string)("forward/slash/foo/bar"),
})
filepath.ToSlash("forward/slash/foo/bar") = (string)("forward/slash/foo/bar")
filepath.VolumeName(`forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (string)("")
filepath.VolumeName(`/forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (string)("")
filepath.VolumeName(`\forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (string)("")
filepath.VolumeName(`C:/forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (string)("C:")
filepath.VolumeName(`C:\forward/slash/foo/bar`) = (string)("C:")
path = (string)("C:/Go/src/path")
path = (string)("C:\\Go\\src\\path\\example_test.go")
```

**Edit:** Tried go1.7beta2 just to be safe, there is no significant difference in output:

```
$ diff go1.6_out.txt go1.7beta2_out.txt
2c2
< go version go1.6 windows/386
---
> go version go1.7beta2 windows/386
48a49
> path = (string)("C:\\Go\\src\\path\\filepath\\export_windows_test.go")
```

**Edit 2:** Added two more `filepath.Rel` cases as @hyangah suggested. They both produce same output as the original one.
